name: Global Summit on Vaccines Research and Development
content: It is a great pleasure and an honor to extend to all a warm invitation to attend the “Global Summit on Vaccines Research and Development (GSVRD2021)”, will be held on November 11-13, 2021 at Marseille, France. The objective of GSVRD2021 is to provide a unique forum for discussion of the latest developments, refresh your knowledge and will offer plenty of networking opportunities, providing you a chance to meet and interact with leading researchers as well as most influential minds in the fields of Vaccines Research and Development.
